name: meltyfi-sui
description: MeltyFi Protocol - Making the illiquid liquid on Sui blockchain

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.fix:move-config: cd contracts/meltyfi && find sources -name '*.move' -exec sed -i '' -e 's/use sui::transfer;//g' -e 's/use sui::tx_context::{Self, TxContext};//g' -e 's/use sui::object::{Self, UID, ID};//g' {} +
scripts.switch:testnet: sui client switch --env testnet && echo 'Switched to testnet environment'
scripts.status: echo '📊 MeltyFi Status:' && echo '├─ Network:' $(sui client active-env 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') && echo '├─ Address:' $(sui client active-address 2>/dev/null | head -c 10)... && echo '└─ Balance:' $(sui client balance 2>/dev/null | grep -oE '[0-9]+(\.\.[0-9]+)?\s*SUI' | head -1 || echo 'unknown')
scripts.explorer: echo 'Open in browser:' && echo '🔍 Sui Explorer: https://suiscan.xyz/testnet/home' && echo '🚰 Testnet Faucet: https://faucet.testnet.sui.io'
scripts.logs: tail -f deployment.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No deployment logs found'
scripts.update:deps: npm update && cd frontend && npm update

author: MeltyFi Team
